pull.title: Replace MAX_OPCODE for OP_NOP10.
pull.body: That OP_NOP10 is the last executable opcode is a bit of a obscure trivia, and the MAX_OPCODE constant already exists. This merely standardizes use of MAX_OPCODE over OP_NOP10 where it makes sense and is more clear.

events.message:
Replace MAX_OPCODE for OP_NOP10.

That OP_NOP10 is the last executable opcode is a bit of a obscure trivia, and the MAX_OPCODE constant already exists. This merely standardizes use of MAX_OPCODE over OP_NOP10 where it makes sense and is more clear.
